biocontainers.name: hypo
biocontainers.summary: Super Fast and Accurate Polisher for Long Read Genome Assemblies.

biotools.summary: HyPo, a Hybrid Polisher, utilizes short as well as long reads within a single run to polish a long reads assembly of small and large genomes.
